title: Cloud bread sandwich
ingredients: ['2 eggs, separated and at room temperature', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons cream cheese, at room temperature', '1 pinch salt (optional)', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning (optional)', '1/2 avocado, sliced', '1/2 tomato, thinly sliced', '3 slices cheese']
